name: #001 - BUEN VIVIR
description:
Original music with clippings of speeches of the Argentine/Mexican philosopher Enrique Dussel.
Text:

Life is infinitely more complex than all galaxies; and today it is in its agony, in a final fight where the human being suddenly faces nature destroying it.
And by destroying it, he destroys life.
And by destroying life he destroys himself.

And there comes the exploitation of nature: the earth itself is considered a thing, not my Mother, but what I can exploit.

On the other hand, for the indigenous, (that Mother) How am I going to exploit her? If she is my mother.
                    How am I going to exploit her? If she is my mother.
                      How am I going to exploit her? If she is my mother.
                        How am I going to exploit her? If she is my mother.
                          How am I going to exploit her? If she is my mother.


Recorded and edited in La Plata, Argentina, 2020.

Special tanks to the compañero Marvin Chez. 


JCZ + JM.
